1.0.name: wordpress/add-url-slugs-as-body-classes
1.0.description:
This plug-in takes the URL, chops it into pieces, and adds each "piece" as an additional class to the body tag.

Meaning, if your page's URL is: http://aarontgrogg.com/2012/02/24/wordpress-plugin-add-url-slugs-as-body-classes/ Your page's body tag would have at least these classes:

2012 02 24 wordpress-plugin-add-url-slugs-as-body-classess

It gets much stronger when you start thinking about Categories or nested Pages:

http://aarontgrogg.com/category/wordpress/

which would give you:

category wordpress

while:

http://aarontgrogg.com/movies/star-trek/wrath-of-khan/
